name: Mage Enlightenment
info: The path of magical enlightenment requires deep understanding of the arcane forces. Study under master mages and unlock the true potential of your magical abilities.
dialogs: The path to magical enlightenment is not easy, young mage.
You must master all schools of elemental magic.
Only then will you achieve true arcane enlightenment.
The arcane forces respond more readily to your call.
Congratulations! You have achieved magical enlightenment!
You are now recognized as a true master of the arcane arts.
decline: I need more magical study first.
